solution_line_template: To meet Dr. Juan's recommendation would mean drinking {total_gallons_required}/{total_days} = <<{total_gallons_required}/{total_days}={required_daily_gallons}>>{required_daily_gallons} gallons daily.

This means that Flora must drink {required_daily_gallons} -{flora_daily_gallons} = <<{required_daily_gallons}-{flora_daily_gallons}={additional_gallons_needed}>>{additional_gallons_needed} more gallons daily.
